channel.title: sf4 on Roy Tang

item.title: Reply to a comment by Trevkor on 'Another pic confirms Yang. Huzzah!' on /r/SF4 at https://reddit.com/r/SF4/comments/db7bn/another_pic_confirms_yang_huzzah/c0yx401/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to a comment by Trevkor on 'Another pic confirms Yang. Huzzah!' on /r/SF4 at https://reddit.com/r/SF4/comments/db7bn/another_pic_confirms_yang_huzzah/c0yx401/:

Yeah, I don’t mind having them in the game, but really, two slots?

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: #sf4: went 2-1 vs random ppl today @ Mega. The stick was easier to use than I expetced, although Guile opp complained of difficulty charging
